targets.expr: sum by (host, resource_id, database) (pg_backend_read_bytes{service="managed-postgresql", envName=~"$envName", resource_id=~"$resourceId", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"})
sum by (host, database, resource_id) (pg_backend_write_bytes{service="managed-postgresql", envName=~"$envName", resource_id=~"$resourceId", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"})
sum by (host, resource_id, database) (pg_backend_cpu{service="managed-postgresql", envName=~"$envName", resource_id=~"$resourceId", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"})
